Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the rent payable by a tenant enrolled in the senior citizen rent increase exemption program when a rent reduction order has been issued.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Maximum collectible rent from a tenant enrolled in the senior citizen rent increase exemption program.

Items.Title: Resolution urging the New York State Assembly to pass A.2242, which would amend the Real Property Tax Law to provide that the definition of income be offset by any unreimbursed medical and prescription drug expenses paid by a senior citizen for purposes of determining eligibility for Senior Citizen Rent Increase Exemption (SCRIE) benefits, and further urging the New York State Senate to introduce and pass a companion bill.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend the Real Property Tax Law to exclude from the definition of income all unreimbursed medical and prescription drug expenses paid by a senior citizen. (A.6518)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the rent payable by a tenant enrolled in the senior citizen rent increase exemption program when a rent reduction order has been issued.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
